knimeNode.name: List Box Input (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Outputs a data table with one column holding a list of strings.

intro.p: Outputs a data table with one column holding a list of strings. The value can also be controlled from a quick form (web port).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.

A weight value that influences the position of the component in the final layout. Lighter elements will be placed at the top, whereas heavier items will be placed nearer the bottom. The value is relative to the weights of the other components in the workflow (absolute value is not relevant, only the relative comparison to other elements).
An undelimited list of char separators including \n and \t. All tokens are used as delimiters.
If enabled the input value will be split into a list of characters, the separator will be ignored.

ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined and the selected option as index.
